Text: uTorrent with able to change bt.sequential_download from menu (Options-Seuqential Download) and alternative DHT-patch.

Also removed window "This program is freeware. If you paid for it, you have been scammed, and you should get a refund" and "Download Translation" menu item and function (due to sequential download patch was applied). All non-English users, except Russians, must use language file from LANG_PACK

Also removed "This program is freeware. If you paid for it, you have been scammed, and you should get a refund" window,  "Download Translation" menu item and function (due to sequential download patch was applied). All international users except Russians must use language file from LNG_PACK folder
